name: Evertale: Evil deeds
description:
Help Lora thwart a plot against the king and find out who is casting curses on the people of Folktale. Learn the history of the continent and face ancient evil.

Play this demo and help me testing Lora's movement. Does she jump too high? Is dash weird? Maybe the controls are not very responsive? Please write any comments & suggestions either in comments or send them in private message. Thank you!

  1. Use arrows (or WSAD) to move around. 
  2. Space to jump.
  3. Left SHIFT to Dash.
  4. Right CTRL to melee attack 
  5. Hit 'C' to cast a curse spell. Hit 'C' again to close Cursed Fist. 
  6. Use up/down arrow to look ahead.
